item.title: 【BLU-RAY & BD RIP】Schiller X Ro Nova X Tricia McTeague - Illuminate (Studiosession) [BDRemux 1080p | PCM 24-bit 48kHz | DTS-HD MA 5.1 | Dolby Atmos]
item.description:
Genre: Electronic
Style: Electro, Downtempo
Year: 2023
Source: Blu-ray (Super Deluxe Edition)

"Illuminate" is a song by the music project Schiller created by the German electronic musician Christopher Von Deylen. With 8 number 1 albums and numerous gold & platinum awards, Schiller is Germany’s number 1 electronic artist. Illuminate features vocals by Ro Nova and Tricia McTeague.

The arrangements on "Illuminate" partly consist of more than 60 audio tracks, which are combined in a so-called "session". Using the title track as an example, the blu-ray contains a studiosession of the song, to give an insight into one of the most complex sessions of the album.

Release Info
Remux from the Blu-ray release of Illuminate (Super Deluxe Edition)
Synced both surround tracks to the videotrack (DTS-HD MA 5.1 & Dolby Atmos)

Note to the peeps @ RuTracker: Give credit if you post the work of someone else!
- Hurby4 aka ADHDerby
